hymn.title: Lord, Deeper Make Thy Home in Me

layout.singingstanza: Lord, deep -- er make Thy home in me 'Til ev -- 'ry room be -- long to Thee, That Thou might ful -- ly make me Thee And so full rest Thou have in me.

lyrics.stanza: Lord, deeper make Thy home in me 'Til ev'ry room belong to Thee, That Thou might fully make me Thee And so full rest Thou have in me.
So also deeper into Thee I'd make my home, my rest in Thee; A pillar in Thy temple be And stay in Thee eternally.
Thy precious blood was shed that we Could closer, closer, closest be; In resurrection brought to Thee That we might be as one as Thee.
Lord, make Thy home more ev'ry day, 'Til one with Thee in ev'ry way, 'Til on me write Thy holy name, 'Til on me write Thy city's name.
Lord, Thou art me and I am Thee, As lovers coinhering, we; Soon then shall come eternity When God and man dwell mutually.
